channel.title: How Do I fix this?
channel.description:
I'm trying to run jc-scape pvp 525 server. But when i click runserver.bat this is what the command prompt says
How do i fix this when i run jc-scape pvp?
This is what i get in command prompt when i run it
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n umber in .class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2009, 05:23:56 pm[/size][hr]please someone help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2009, 05:39:44 pm[/size][hr]never mind, i just needed a better update of java!

item.title: How Do I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @globerskater500 globerskater500
item.description:
@globerskater500 wrote:

I’m trying to run jc-scape pvp 525 server. But when i click runserver.bat this is what the command prompt says

How do i fix this when i run jc-scape pvp?

This is what i get in command prompt when i run it

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n
umber in .class file
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2009, 05:23:56 pm[/size][hr]please someone help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 19, 2009, 05:39:44 pm[/size][hr]never mind, i just needed a better update of java!
